name: Srishti Software Applications Pvt. Ltd.
tag_list: hospital-information-system, his, hmis, hospital-management-information-system, emr, pacs, lis
overview:
Srishti Software is a leading software product company providing cutting edge solutions in the Healthcare domain anchored around its product PARAS.

PARAS Healthcare Solution Suite is a fully integrated solution for hospital of various sizes and complexities. This allows our customers to choose the right sized solution based on their current requirement. Our adaptive and modular design of the solution helps our customers to grow without the fear of technology / solution replacement.

PARAS - suite of Healthcare Software solutions includes:

Hospital Information Management System Enterprise class fully integrated solution Radiology Information Management System PACS / RIS Electronic Medical Records Disease Registeries Cord Blood Bank

Differentiated Advantages

Bi-directional integrations between business and Clinical processes. Helps hospital on resource optimization and plug revenue leakages.
Delivers improved patient care conforming to best clinical and administrative practices
Multi - Location product that enables centralization monitoring, intelligent decision making and improved audits & controls
On-demand applications scalability that ensures non-obsolescence of solution as business grows
100% successful product implementation record across geographies
Native multilingual support: Chinese, Vietnamese, Arabic, English version already available
